title: pet grooming service

grooming.groomTitle: We provide high quality grooming services for both cats and dogs at the comfort of your own home using our state of the art in-van grooming station.
grooming.bulletOne: Schedule appointments that suit your needs and availability.
grooming.bulletTwo: Skip the line and have us brought to your front doorstep.
grooming.bulletThree: We can take care of special types of baths to take care of your pets conditions.

featuresArray.title: Around the clock service
featuresArray.description: Our team is working 24 hours a day to provide the best services, with seperate teams of specialists.

featuresArray.title: State of the art grooming station
featuresArray.description: We pride ourselves on proving the best service possible with the latest technology available

featuresArray.title: No annoying waiting in line
featuresArray.description: Why wait your turn, when you can have someone work aroud you?

featuresArray.title: Flexible
featuresArray.description: Anytime, at your convenience, we will be at your doorstep.

featuresTitleHeader: A convenient way to groom your pet for busy people
featuresText: Since we began in 2021, we have been working to deliver the best grooming service possible. The busy day to day life of the current generation leaves little time to travel to vet stores,so why not bring the pet store to you? People choose us for:
lineSkip: Skip the waiting line and let us come to you.
lineSkipText: Ever arrive for your appointment on time only to have to wait even longer? That wont happen with us.

mockDataArray.title: Scehduled appointments
mockDataArray.description: Schedule your appointment, and we will arrive on time at the designated location. No waiting time.

mockDataArray.title: Privacy focused
mockDataArray.description: Nothing is disclosed to other people, everything is between us and the owner of the animals.

mockDataArray.title: Special Care
mockDataArray.description: We understand that every animal is different and needs special attention, so we do the utmost to make your pet feel loved.

serviceTitle: Come and get to know our service.
goal: Our goal is to provide the best grooming service possible, while providing a safe and calming environment. We value your time,and so we have a routine to follow that will get us in and out in no time, so you dont have to wait around all day.

dataArray.title: Check-in
dataArray.description: Meet and greet with your fluffy ball of fur.

dataArray.title: Bath and Hydrate
dataArray.description: Gently massage and hydrate to remove oil and dirt from your fluffy ball of love.

dataArray.title: Dry and comb
dataArray.description: We use a variety of methods to dry varying from handheld to tablestand, depending on the size of the animal and what he is comfortable with.

dataArray.title: Haircut and perfume
dataArray.description: We give your animal a trim or cut catered to request and leave them smelling pawesome on exit!
